reasoning: Acute aortic dissection incidence estimated 2-3 per 100k person-years (2.6 global average). Epidemiological data from multiple registries (IRAD, Swedish registry) and literature. Some geographic variation with higher rates in regions with higher hypertension prevalence.
source: Hagan AP et al. (2000). The International Registry of Acute Aortic Dissection (IRAD): New insights into an old disease. JAMA. 283(7):897-903
